name: oh no, a hole
description:
One day, some random dude falls down a hole. But oh no, they are allergic to holes(what?). 

So they have to jump back out.

What an adventure.

Controls(if they weren't obvious)

Gamepad

 - Left Analog stick to move

- A to jump

Keyboard

- A and D to move

- Space to jump

You can hold the jump button for a bit before jumping to charge your jump.

Fullscreen Recommended 

Please note that the embed build may have trouble fully functioning on Mac, so we recommend downloading it instead.

Also, downloadable builds may not be up to date with the embed. Be weary of softlocks.

All assets were made by SnugPig Studios during the length of the Bored Pixels Game Jam, EXCEPT the FFF Forward Font, which is by Fonts For Flash.
